official_title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to recommend to Congress whether the limitation on the amount of compensation of officers of the Armed Forces that may be excluded from gross income for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 while serving in a combat zone should be increased.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to report to the Senate and House Armed Services Committees on whether the current $500 limit on the amount of compensation an officer in the armed forces may exclude from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code for any month during which the officer served in a combat zone should be increased.
